title: Christina Aguilera leaves Los Angeles lunch in Mickey Mouse hoodie
text:
Christina Aguilera kicked off her entertainment as a member of The All New Mickey Mouse Club all the way back in the early 90s.

And it looked like the Beautiful crooner, 38, still had love for Disney when she was out in the Bel-Air neighborhood of Los Angeles on Monday.

Christina looked comfy and cute while wearing a baggy Mickey Mouse sweater while out with a friend.

All ears! Christina Aguilera honored her Disney roots by wearing a Mickey Mouse hoodie out in Bel-Air on Monday

While she kept her apparel comfortable, rounding out the look with Vans sneakers and Adidas sweats, the songstress added a splash of glamour with a red lip.

Meanwhile, her pal was low-key in an all black look with white sneakers.

Christina and her pal looked content after enjoying a sushi lunch at SHU in the Beverly Glen center, both leaving the restaurant carrying to-go cups.

Pop of color: She kept her apparel comfortable but added a splash of glamour with a red lip

Pop of color: She kept her apparel comfortable but added a splash of glamour with a red lip

The love between Disney and Christina is mutual.

Earlier this year the Genie In A Bottle singer was honored at Disney's annual D23 Expo as a Disney Legend.

After getting her start as a Mouseketeer, she went on to sing the pop version of the hit Reflection off the Mulan soundtrack. She's also appeared on several ABC favorites like Dancing With The Stars and the 2019 telecast of Dick Clark’s New Year’s Rockin’ Eve With Ryan Seacrest.

Disney legend: Earlier this year the Genie In A Bottle singer was honored at Disney's annual D23 Expo as a Disney Legend. Above the star is seen with her fellow Mouseketeers, who included future stars Justin Timberlake and Ryan Gosling

Stage presence: Christina wrapped up the second leg of her Las Vegas concert residency The Xperience at the Zappos Theater earlier this month

It's been a busy summer for Christina, who just wrapped up the second leg of her Las Vegas concert residency The Xperience at the Zappos Theater at Planet Hollywood earlier this month.

Next Aguilera will pick up her European tour, The X Tour, November 5 in Dublin, Ireland before The Xperience picks up yet again at the end of December.

In addition to her tight touring schedule, Christina also just released the song Haunted Heart for the animated Addams Family film, which is currently in theaters.
description: Christina Aguilera kicked off her entertainment as a member of The All New Mickey Mouse Club all the way back in the early 90s. And it looked like the Beautiful crooner still had love for Disney Monday.
